blocks.name: frpomin
blocks.content: Every (possibly proper) subclass of a class ` A ` with a founded, partial-ordering, set-like relation ` R ` has a minimal element. The additional condition of partial ordering over ~ frmin enables avoiding infinity. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)

blocks.name: frpomin2
blocks.content: Every (possibly proper) subclass of a class ` A ` with a founded, partial-ordering, set-like relation ` R ` has a minimal element. The additional condition of partial ordering over ~ frmin enables avoiding infinity. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm frpomin2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wfr(c0, c1), wpo(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wfr(c0, c1), wpo(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))))
  frpomin(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  rexbii(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  bitri(wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls, crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  dfpred3(hs0, c0, c2, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  rabeq0(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}

  syl5bi(w3a(wfr(c0, c1), wpo(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wne(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls))

blocks.name: frpoinsg
blocks.content: Founded, Partial-Ordering Induction Schema. If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a founded, partially-ordered class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2022.)

  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)

  ⊢ ((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0))
  ⊣ (((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  mpdan((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, ({ s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))))
  jctil((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, (c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), (Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  syl6ibr(((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  jctild(((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ c1, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  syl5(((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0))
  sylbi(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  dfss3(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  ralimi(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0)

  chvar(s0, hs0, (((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)→(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0)), (((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)))
  nfim(s0, ((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(s0, ((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  nfim(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)

blocks.name: frmin
blocks.content: Every (possibly proper) subclass of a class ` A ` with a founded, set-like relation ` R ` has a minimal element. Lemma 4.3 of Don Monk's notes for Advanced Set Theory, which can be found at ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/settheory . This is a very strong generalization of ~ tz6.26 and ~ tz7.5 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frmin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp32(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  syl6com(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls))), wa(wfr(c0, c2), wse(c0, c2)))
  anim12d(wss(c2, c1), wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1), wfr(c0, c2), wse(c0, c2))
  frss(c2, c1, c0)
  sess2(c2, c1, c0)

blocks.name: frind
blocks.content: The principle of founded induction. Theorem 4.4 of Don Monk's notes (see ~ frmin ). This principle states that if ` B ` is a subclass of a founded class ` A ` with the property that every element of ` B ` whose initial segment is included in ` A ` is itself equal to ` A ` . Compare ~ wfi and ~ tfi , which are special cases of this theorem that do not require the axiom of infinity to prove. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: frindi
blocks.content: The principle of founded induction. Theorem 4.4 of Don Monk's notes (see ~ frmin ). This principle states that if ` B ` is a subclass of a founded class ` A ` with the property that every element of ` B ` whose initial segment is included in ` A ` is itself equal to ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: frinsg
blocks.content: Founded Induction Schema. If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a founded class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

thm frinsg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0), wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, w0)))
  mpanr12(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wss(crab(s0, c1, w0), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0)))))
  ssrab2(s0, c1, w0)
  rgen(hs0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0))))
  syl6ibr(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  anc2li(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  syl5(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)))
  sylbi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0))))
  dfss3(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))
  ralimi(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  elrabsf(s0, cv(s1), c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfim(s0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  nfral(s0, s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  nfcv(s0, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(s1), w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  raleqdv(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  predeq3(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  elrabsf(s0, cv(hs0), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  frind(hs0, c0, c1, crab(s0, c1, w0))

  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

thm frinsg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  mpanr12((c0[Fr]c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })))
  ssrab2(s0, c1, w0)
  rgen(hs0, c1, (Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  syl6ibr(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  anc2li(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  syl5(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0))
  sylbi(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  dfss3(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  ralimi(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0)
  simprbi(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  elrabsf(s0, s1, c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0)), (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)))
  nfim(s0, hs0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfim(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfral(s0, s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), [s1 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, Pred(c0, c1, hs0))
  nfsbc1v(s0, s1, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0), hs0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  raleqdv(s1, Pred(c0, c1, s0), Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s0 = hs0, [s1 / s0]w0)
  predeq3(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs0, w0)
  elrabsf(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  frind(hs0, c0, c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  rabid2(s0, c1, w0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
}

blocks.name: frins
blocks.content: Founded Induction Schema. If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a founded class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

thm frins(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  -| wfr(c1, c0)
  -| wse(c1, c0)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(wral(s0, c0, w0), wfr(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0))
  frinsg(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frins(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → w0)
  ⊣ c1[Fr]c0
  ⊣ c1[Se]c0
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c1, c0, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0), c1[Fr]c0, c1[Se]c0)
  frinsg(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0)
}

thm frins2fg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  frinsg(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1))
  ralbii(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), w1)
  bitr3i(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
}

thm frins2fg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
